entry.title: You're like Me
entry.summary:
Author: chaWOOPa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,175Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Tim finishes brushing his teeth and leans to spit the toothpaste out if his mouth. Something about the container tugs at his brain; he recognizes the white lid from somewhere, but he needs a closer look to really tell where. He rinses his mouth quickly, dries his hands, and then turns to inspect it closer.He immediately decides he's going to blame the fact that he didn't recognize a clearly labeled sharps container on how late it is.
